message: So, Looking at Deliverable 2, I'm thinking Team/Teams for one, Project/Projects for another, updating Student and GradesDB for a third, and GUI for a fourth
@TonyPotter You mean in terms of being able to break things up?

@TonyPotter I was a little confused in my first run through reading about Deliverable 2, but now I saw the following notice which clears things up a bit "*Important: you should NOT write the code that implements the functionality described in the story cards, but just the JUnit tests for that code! (And possibly the skeleton code needed to make the tests compile, as described above.) *"
So it looks like this week we're just focusing on the JUnit test cases and writing some stubs for making the tests compile
right.
so how did we want to divide up the work
I'm happy to take any of the parts you mentioned above, no preference on my part
I can work on updating the Student and GradesDB since I already have some investment in those files.
OK, I can take the Project/Projects ones (it looks like the GUI tests are for Extra Credit only?)
It does but it would be nice to get it taken care of to offset any issues with Project 2.
Hi guys,
Heya1
You can give me any task - since I have been disconnected I am not in a position to pick; So I will trust your judgement to assign something to me.
I tried to access Del2 this morning and got an error - when did they get posted?
about 8AMish CST.
we're just writing tests.  Do you want to write for Team/Teams or GUI?
OK - that explains it.   You pick.
No coding?...bummer!
well, Chandra wanted to do some programming, so I'd say let Chandra have Team/Teams and you can set up tests for GUI
I'm sure we'll end up coding this in Part 3.
Ok - got it.
When does next sem start?

No idea.  Our last deliverable is due Fri of next week.  So one week for grading/posting, It'll probably start the following Monday.  So Aug 18 for real GT, Aug 25 for us since we're alwasy a week late?
Hey guys, i was reading through the deliverable 2, i can work with creating the GUI for the tool.
Right now we're just creating tests for GUI, etc.  You and Murali can arm-wrestle for what to do :)
LOL, well i can get started with it, and i'm sure Murali will guide me through, i wouldn't dare to arm-wrestle him lol
I should have read above before typing, i'm taking the Team/Teams, sounds good :)
Grrr...
Grrr?
Trying to scare Chandra...
lol, i'm scared enough Murali :D
lol
Since we are all clear....we will post back here Tuesday Night?  I will work on GUI and report back.
right.
Ok - see you guys then.
